TopicTitle: Make a Kerbal go into ragdoll mode?

Articles.Content: I think there was some YouTube video (probably by Danny2462) where the creator put an EVA Kerbal into ragdoll mode by pushing a button. Is there actually any way to do this, or is it just some kind of mod?

If your in space and you turn off the RCS ('R') they kind of go into a ragdoll state). I remember a Scott Manley video where a bug caused him to totally lose control of one and he had to capture it in the cargo bay of his plane and land it with him in the back. I thought it was quite impressive.
